## Change description
- What SRS task was completed?
- Are changes compatible with vision of a project?

## Traceability
- Closes # [Kanban_Task_Number]
- Milestone: Requirements Analysis

## Nature of a changes
- [ ] New chapter
- [ ] Fix/Change to existing chapter
- [ ] Formatting change

## Verification
- [ ] Does the documentation render correctly in Markdown?
- [ ] Are the requirements measurable and testable?
- [ ] Is the text written in acceptable linguistic quality? 

## Additional thoughts
